programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: Brittisotilas Jody joutuu IRA:n sieppaamaksi. Jodyn ja hanen vartijansa Fergusin valille muodostuu ystavyyssuhde. Kun Jodyn vapauttamiselle asetetut ehdot eivat toteudu, juuri Fergus maarataan teloittamaan Jody. Tehtava osoittautuu vaikeaksi Fergusille. Fergus pakenee ja aloittaa uuden elaman Lontoossa. Myos Jodyn aiempi elama kietoutuu Fergusin elamaan. The Crying Game on Oscar-palkittu jannityselokuva. Paaosissa Forest Whitaker, Stephen Rea ja Jaye Davidson.

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Astrid on 15-vuotias tytto, jonka elama muuttuu peruuttamattomalla tavalla, kun poliisi saapuu pidattamaan hanen aitiaan. Ingrid-aiti paatyy telkien taakse murhattuaan poikaystavansa ja alaikainen Astrid aloittaa oman kujanjuoksunsa. Sijaiskoti toisensa jalkeen tulee tutuksi kapinalliselle teini-ikaiselle, joka yrittaa epatoivoisesti loytaa oman identiteettinsa ihmisten ja maisemien alati vaihtuessa hanen ymparillaan. Astridin tavatessa pojan nimelta Paul heraa toivo, etta myos ystavyydella ja rakkaudella voisi olla sijaa hanen elamassaan.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: House of Sand and Fog
programme.desc: Kathyn elama on riekaleina. Hanen miehensa on jattanyt hanet, ja hanen isaltaan perimansa talo on otettu hanelta pois vaarista syista. Talon uuden omistajan aikeet eivat ole pahat, mutta oikeusriita on vaistamaton. Konflikti, joka vain upottaa kaikki mukana olevat entista syvemmalle suohon. Kolminkertainen Oscar-ehdokas House of Sand and Fog on psykologinen draama perhetragedioista ja amerikkalaisesta unelmasta, ja elokuvan paarooleissa nahdaan Jennifer Connelly (Kaunis mies, Unelmien sielunmessu) ja Ben Kingsley (Gandhi, Schindlerin lista).

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: Susannah Cahalan on hiljattain valmistunut yliopistosta ja elaa unelmaelamaa New Yorkissa. Han on lupaava toimittaja New York Postin toimituksessa ja rakastunut muusikko Stepheniin. Lisaksi esimies on antanut hanelle toimeksiannon, joka mahdollistaa uran lapilyonnin, joten kaikki on kohdallaan. Pian asiat alkavat kuitenkin luisua kasista. Susannah sairastuu sitkeaan flunssaan, unohtaa asioita ja myohastyy aikatauluistaan. Han kuulee ihmisten puhuvan selkansa takana, on varma, etta Stephen tapailee toista naista eika pysty hallitsemaan kehoaan. Ja tilanne pahenee; Susannah alkaa saada voimakkaita kohtauksia ja hanen yha psykoottisemmaksi kayva kaytoksensa vaatii jatkuvaa valvontaa.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Kathryn and Darren are looking for a retreat where they’re not in danger of upsetting the neighbors. The couple teach music at home – everything from the piano, the saxophone, to the drums. They want a country pad with scope to set up a music studio.

programme.desc: A surgeon is stabbed to death, and the most likely suspect is seen in a restaurant at the time of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2008, the body of Colorado real estate developer Alan Helmick was found by his wife, Miriam, who then became the prime suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman is stabbed more than 100 times. The killer leaves DNA behind, but investigators must play a cat-and-mouse game to obtain a suspects DNA to match.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2008, college co-ed Jenna Verhaalen was found dead in her Bryan, Texas apartment. Petechial hemorrhages in her eyes indicated that she was strangled.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The wife of a respected police officer was murdered in her own home. The crime went unsolved for more than a decade, until a newly formed cold case unit took a fresh look at the evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The crime scene was especially violent: A couple had been shot to death. Was their teenage daughter complicit?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On Halloween night 2004, Adriane Insogna and Leslie Mazzara were brutally murdered in their Napa home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lives changed in the 20 years following an unsolved murder, and so did forensic science. In time, a high-powered microscope and DNA profiling revealed a clue no one had seen before.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an off-duty policeman was shot dead, his fellow officers were determined to solve the crime. They needed clues to find the killer and they discovered them in tiny fibres and an asthma inhaler.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: There was no clear reason for a young, healthy college student to be dead. But when the coroner discovered a tiny clue during the autopsy, investigators were able to uncover a mystery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors dont know why a scientist is gravely ill. When tests reveal the cause, its too late to save him.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After inspecting storm damage to a home in Tampa, an insurance assessor simply disappeared. Thirty hours later, her body was found in a nearby river. But the killer had been careless.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2004, Rebecca Barney and her soon-to-be ex-husband Fred were found shot to death in their Tulsa, Oklahoma, home, which had been set on fire.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In little more than a month, two women who lived in the same apartment complex were brutally murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2004, Mary Ann Clibbery was found brutally murdered in her Illinois business and investigators had to determine if this was a robbery gone wrong or a calculated murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In the 1990s, the media dubbed Richard Rogers the "Last Call Killer" because he targeted men in gay bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Its usually easy to determine how a criminal entered the crime scene. But in this case, it was far from clear. It looked like the killer vanished into thin air...and perhaps he had.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mans wife took her own life and his college sweetheart killed herself the same way. Was it coincidence?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The prime suspect had a criminal record and his drivers license was found at the scene of a brutal double homicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder trail turned cold, until police got a call from a woman whose husband, Gerald Powers, had a criminal past and a fondness for Chevy Berettas.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After shooting his victims in the head, the killer staged the scene, placed the incriminating evidence into a plastic bag and tossed it into the river.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a college co-ed was found on a farm covered with her own denim as well as the jeans of the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Shamaia Smith disappeared from the strip club she worked at in East Hartford, CT. Police look at various customers of the strip club, but focus on local businessman Kenneth Otto.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An assistant manager of a Florida steakhouse is stabbed to death. It appears to be a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Dorothy Donovan was murdered in her Dover, Delaware home and police are skeptical when her son Charles Holden stated that she was murdered by a hitchhiker he had picked up.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A wealthy man and his wife were attacked by three masked men outside their luxurious Louisiana home. He was shot dead and she was forced to open their hidden safe.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, the body of exotic dancer Rachel Siani was found beneath a New Jersey bridge. Investigators wondered if she had committed suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The killer probably hoped to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene. But investigators saw through the attempt almost immediately.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman attends evening church services... then disappears. When her abandoned car is found, the tank is empty and a gas can she kept in her trunk for emergencies is missing.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In one of the most brazen crimes of the 20th century, the chairman of the Coors Brewing Company was kidnapped.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The brutal murder of a state park employee over $2,000 rattles her co-workers and tourists while leaving police to sift through hundreds of leads.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A driver said he couldnt have hit and killed a pedestrian because his Jeep had been sold months ago.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman was found dead on the bedroom floor of her apartment. The crime scene yielded little of value and investigators wondered if they would find enough evidence to make a case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Michigan State University grad student disappeared and was presumed dead. With the help of a professor of geological sciences, police hoped to get the "dirt" on her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 1993, young mother Tammy Tatum was sexually assaulted and murdered in her Longmont, Colorado apartment.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police get a clue about a couple who disappeared on Memorial Day weekend during an in-progress robbery.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, twelve of the best GLORY featherweights will compete opposite twelve of the best RISE featherweights in a series of knockout bouts until one fighter becomes the Last Featherweight Standing.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlining the event is a Light Heavyweight Title Fight between current Champion Sergej Maslobojev and top ranked contender Donegi Abena. A Middleweight Title Bout between Champion Donovan Wisse and current number one contender Cesar Almeida will serve as the event’s co-headliner. Also featured on the card is a middleweight bout between top-five contenders Serkan Ozcaglayan and Sergej Braun. Plus, perennial lightweight contender Guerric Billet will meet Cihad Akipa. GLORY 83 will also mark the promotional debuts for both Uku Jurjendal and Nabil Khachab, who will square off against each other in a heavyweight bout. Additionally, rising featherweight contender Ahmad Chikh Mousa will look to...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: In Tulsa, after a rancher dies during a feud with a major oil company, his daughter, driven by revenge, starts digging for oil herself.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

programme.title: California
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Michael "California" Random, is released from prison and goes to Missouri with his partner William.

programme.title: Apache Fury
programme.desc: A judge encounters a man (Frank Latimore) he once wronged after an Apache attack. The attack forces him, his fiancee and their fellow stagecoach passengers to take refuge at a rest stop.

programme.title: Trinity and Sartana Are Coming
programme.desc: Sartana and Trinity set out on a grudging relationship hell bent for gold and comic brawls.

programme.title: Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a little girl, whose mother made her the heir of a cash-able oil company, and must protect her from an outlaw as they search for the girls father.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django is on the trail of some renegade outlaws who raped and killed his wife. En route, he rescues a horse thief from an impromptu hanging. He discovers the man knows who committed the murder. The men team up and head west for revenge.

programme.title: More Dollars for the MacGregors
programme.desc: Forsythe, who uses his wife as bait, has gained a reputation as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Fighters from Ave Maria
programme.desc: Western spaghetti set in gold rush times in California, involving circus acrobats, outlaws and a gold mine.

programme.title: The Executioner of God
programme.desc: A former gunman turned priest seeks vengeance on three bandits who are masquerading as law-abiding citizens.

programme.title: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre
programme.desc: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre - Django has become a bounty hunter who is asked to chase a villain who has kidnapped a young girl.

programme.title: The Man from Utah
programme.desc: In a horse-riding rodeo contest bad guys want John Weston to lose. When he doesnt go along they add some insurance: a poisoned needle just under his saddle.

programme.title: Theres a Noose Waiting for You Trinity!
programme.desc: Trinity is an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. Unfortunately for him, a ruthless bounty hunter is on his trail.

programme.title: Long Days of Vengeance
programme.desc: After three years of brutal labor for a crime he didnt commit, ex-Sheriff Ted Barnett escapes prison to hunt down the three men who framed him for his fathers murder. "Long Days of Vengeance" is a gripping spaghetti western about justice, revenge, and redemption under the scorching desert sun.

programme.title: May God Forgive You... But I Wont
programme.desc: While Cjamango is away from his ranch six bandits attack and kill all the members of his family.

programme.title: Pistol for a Hundred Coffins
programme.desc: A Civil War veteran swears revenge when he returns home to find his family killed by a local gang.

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Your Angel of Death
programme.desc: A bank that was thought to be impenetrable is robbed by a man wearing the trademark Sartana cloak. Our black-clad hero soon has a price on his head and must try to proof his innocence with the help of his shabby friend Buddy Ben.

programme.title: Dont Wait, Django... Shoot!
programme.desc: Django returns home to discover that his father has been killed by local bandits in a business deal gone wrong.

programme.title: Little Big Horn
programme.desc: In 1876 Montana, Capt. Phillip Donlin’s duty in the Great Sioux Wars strains his marriage as his wife, Celie, has an affair with Lt. Haywood. Overhearing their plans to flee, Donlin is heartbroken but continues his mission to warn General Custer of a massive Sioux buildup. Defying orders, he presses on, racing against time to reach Custer before disaster strikes.

programme.title: Django... Adios!
programme.desc: Django, a former federal sheriff, is arrested for allegedly stealing a chest full of dollars that was earmarked for the construction of a school and church in Silver City.

programme.title: Dead Men Dont Make Shadows
programme.desc: Feared bounty hunter Lazar arrives in a gold-mining town to blackmail ex-bandit Barrett, now a ruthless mine owner. Followed by a young gunfighter with his own motive, Lazar forges an uneasy alliance. But as tensions rise, it becomes clear that not everyone is after gold—some seek justice, others revenge.

programme.title: A Coffin from Sartana
programme.desc: After witnessing a brutal massacre, the legendary hero Sartana is ready to do some investigating. Almost everyone in the tiny town of Indian Creek seems eager to buy up the property left behind by the murder victims, ...

programme.title: Four Fast Guns
programme.desc: A gunslinger rides into Purgatory, claiming to be the town tamer they hired—though he killed the real one. For $500, payable to a widow of his victim, he takes on the towns wheelchair-bound crime boss. The outlaw fights to free the town while facing three hired killers sent to eliminate him, testing his resolve and his skill as lawman-for-hire.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Siouxs patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Iron Brothers
programme.desc: Fur trappers Abel and Henry Iron struggle in the declining fur trade in the Rocky Mountains. After an accidental death during an encounter with Shoshone Indians, the brothers find themselves fleeing into the wilderness. As they evade pursuing warriors, Abel and Henry must rely on their bond of brotherhood to survive and escape their fate.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff and his younger brother travel across the Mexican border to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: The Rewards Yours... The Mans Mine
programme.desc: A group of killers seek out wanted gunman El Puro for the $10,000 dollar reward.

programme.title: $1,000 on the Black
programme.desc: Twelve years ago, Sartana framed his brother Johnny for murder and stole his girlfriend. Now the towns undisputed boss and doted over by his possessive mother, Sartana seems safe - until, his sentence served, Johnny rides back into town.

programme.title: Life is Tough, Eh Providence
programme.desc: An eccentric bounty hunter named Providence captures and sets free a criminal in order to collect the same bounty over and over again in different states, until they discover that a local sheriff is up to something crooked.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Italy, Morocco, Ethiopia, Jamaica
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Italy - Roasted Radishes and Radish Pesto, Morocco - Moroccan Spiced Apples, Ethiopia - Ethiopian Spinach Dip, and Jamaica - Jerk Shiitakes with Coconut Rice!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular cornbread recipes, from hosts like Natalia Machado and Spencer Watts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Nothings more warm and soothing than Argentinian comfort food and host Natalia Machado shows us how to make some!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Italian Classics with Texture
programme.desc: Fun host Vanessa Gianfrancesco prepares an Italian feast with classic flavours and amazing textures.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing stuffed dishes! Josh makes a burger stuffed with foie gras and brie while Erica stuffs a zucchini with lamb!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: Its all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Weve all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. Thats right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before its cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencers Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Garbanzo Beans and Grapefruit
programme.desc: In this fast-paced episode, host Theresa Visintin uses two unlikely ingredients that start with the letter "G," garbanzo beans and grapefruit! First up, Theresa cooks socca, a savoury garbanzo bean pancake recipe, and infuses it with Mediterranean flavours. To make her batter, Theresa combines chickpea flour with salty olives, sweet red pepper, and fresh basil. Once the batter is ready to go, she fries the savoury crepe. Next up, Theresa balances tart grapefruit with a sweet buttery lobster tail. But thats not sweet enough for Theresa! She prepares sabayon, a delicate honey custard that melts in your mouth. Finally, Theresa shows us how to make a mouth-watering dish by combining...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kaffir Lime and Kohlrabi
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell has a challenge on his hands after picking the letter “K.” He decides to use ingredients kaffir lime and kohlrabi. First, Robert re-invents the ordinary shrimp skewer, using lemongrass as the skewer (yes, the skewer!). He brings the flavour to the next level with zesty kaffir lime. Using the leaves of the kaffir lime with fresh herbs, Robert makes a dipping sauce for the skewer. Next, Robert fries up salty peameal bacon in one pan and sautés earthy kohlrabi with leeks, potato, and garlic in another. He brings the ingredients together into a single skillet, adding eggs and baking it into a hearty frittata. For his final dish, Robert uses both kaffir lime and kohlrabi in...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: “A” is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: Who doesnt love Sweet Kisses? Join Chef Kimberly Lallouz as she showers them on her multi-course feast all laid out in One Big Recipe. Her Spicy Cornbread gets the first peck with lip-smacking Honey Butter. Then, its a berry... nice smooch for a seared rare Duck Breast appetizer with Cherries and Walnuts. Avocado Honeydew Gazpacho follows, silky and savoury, with just a gentle sugary buss from the melon, its a chilled soup gorgeously garnished with crostini and mascarpone. Citrus smooches Salmon on the main course, butter basted and presented with shattered dried citrus shards sprinkled over top and Basmati with Cranberries and Rice Vinegar alongside. Anyone can do it! Its all in the...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: After picking the letter "L," Chef Robert Jewell takes on lamb and licorice in this ingredient challenge. He starts with aromatic Moroccan lamb riblets, an appetizer that will make you want this spicy dish as your main course too. Next, Robert takes it up a notch by showing us how to make licorice - yes, the candy! He brings coconut oil, brown sugar, creamed coconut, and molasses to boil before skillfully adding flour and anise to make sweet, chewy coconut licorice. Finally, Robert concocts the perfect recipe that combines succulent lamb with sweet licorice.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin creates savoury meals in this letter "R" challenge featuring radicchios and raisins. First, Theresa chops up bold and bitter radicchios, grilling them until the edges are a crispy golden brown and perfect for a warm wedge salad. Then, she tosses fried pancetta and earthy portobello mushrooms in a luxurious champagne vinegar and pours it over the crispy radicchio. Theresa tops this warm salad with creamy crumbled goats cheese. For her next dish, Theresa prepares a rum raisin sauce using golden sultana raisins, dark rum, and fresh orange. Theresa pours the sauce over succulent ham. Is your mouth watering yet? Finally, Theresa combines radicchio and raisin into a...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Its all about pork and peanuts, todays challenge is the letter "P." Chef Lauren Gulyas serves up an old school favourite, smothered pork chops. Using a blend of savoury ingredients, and with the help of her cast iron pan, Chef Lauren provides us with tips on how to keep your pork tender and tasty. Next, its time for a West African peanut soup. Drizzling garlic, ginger and onions with extra virgin olive oil and letting them sizzle in a frying pan until the onions are soft brings out a sweetness that lends itself beautifully to the salty, earthy taste of peanuts. To finish, Chef Lauren puts an Asian twist on a southern classic, when she combines the two ingredients.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful birds eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencers Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencers Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: Its all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Weve all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. Thats right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before its cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencers Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This episode features two fighters who appear later in this series on the Emelianenko Vs Lindland PPV bill. Here, get a first look at the undefeated Eddie Alvarez as he fights Derrick Noble. And the hard-punching Amanda Buckner takes on well-rounded brawler Shayna Baszler.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyans first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter wont be easy, but Mike Patts devastating submission win from series 1 proves hes ready. Wisniewskis development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Ken Sumner as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Lorenzo Anello on amerikanitalialainen bussikuski Bronxin esikaupungissa New Yorkissa. Hanella on vaimo Rosina ja poika Calogero. Eraana paivana Calogero joutuu silminnakijaksi murhaan kotitalonsa edessa.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Jack (Edward Norton) karsii unettomuudesta ja yrittaa paeta tylsaa elamaansa. Han tapaa karismaattisen Tyler Durdenin (Brad Pitt), joka uskoo itsetuhoon elaman suolana, ja yhdessa he perustavat salaisen tappelukerhon, Fight Clubin, jonka suosio on valtava.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Alvin Ja Pikkuoravat
programme.desc: Usean sukupolven ajan fanit ympari maailman hurmanneilla pikkuoravilla on paljon laulettavaa elokuvadebyytissaan – hulvattoman hauskassa seikkailussa taynna mukaansatempaavaa musiikkia ja porroista porraamista! Kun uransa kanssa ponnisteleva lauluntekija Dave Seville ottaa hoteisiinsa lahjakkaan pikkuoravakolmikon, Alvinin, Simon ja Teron, heista tulee yhdessa yossa musiikillinen sensaatio. !

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: Halloween (Directors Cut)
programme.desc: Michael Meyers etsii raivoisasti nuorempaa siskoaan vapauduttuaan psykiatrisesta sairaalasta, jonne hanet maarattiin 17 vuodeksi – eika kukaan ole turvassa. Vuoden 1978 elokuvan uuden version on ohjannut John Carpenter.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: DAREDEVIL (Ben Affleck), katujen armoton oikeudenpuolustaja, rakastuu kauniiseen taistelulajitaituri Elektraan (Jennifer Garner). Elektra perheineen joutuu haijyn palkkamurhaajan maalitauluksi ja DAREDEVILin on kohdattava tosiasia: han saattaa menettaa ainoan rakkautensa.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.
