programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is sent to intake for indecent exposure. In Spokane, WA a man threatening bodily harm to himself is placed in a restraining chair. In Salt Lake City, UT an intoxicated woman fades in and out of coherency. In Portland, OR an amputee is detained for dodging the subway toll.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car. Violent outbursts plague an arrest. One woman struggles with bail. Three drunk men become wildly emotional.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Years Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman gives officers a hard time in booking when she refuses to comply. A catwoman is arrested for hitting her date at a club, and a pusherman discusses his contributions to the economy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why hes in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspects property. Two rowdy inmates dont quite hit it off when they invade each others personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Brittany Murphy ja Dakota Fanning loistavat kirkkaammin kuin kaikki Manhattanin valot tassa ihastuttavassa New Yorkin satukertomuksessa. Molly (Murphy) on juhlivainen prinsessa, jonka rahat juuri loppuivat. Ray (Fanning) on nirso yhdeksanvuotias tytto, jonka viimeisin lastenhoitaja juuri lahti. Kun Rayn liian kiireinen aiti (Heather Locklear) palkkaa Mollyn uudeksi lastenhoitajaksi, se on taydellinen tilaisuus molemmille tytoille muuttaa tapojaan ja oppia, etta joskus paras ystavasi voi tulla odottamattomassa muodossa!

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Hamekytta 2
programme.desc: Hamekytan villissa jatko-osassa Martin Lawrence ja Nia Long palaavatviihdyttamaan koko perhetta. Kansakunnan turvallisuus on uhattuna ja FBI-agenttiMalcolm Turner in on jalleen kerran...

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Fifty Shades Of Black
programme.desc: Tassa paattomassa spoofkomediassa, joka ottaa elokuvan "Fifty Shades of Grey" lempeaan kasittelyynsa, tapaamme mystisen miljonaarin Christian Blackin, joka, huolimatta puutteellisista kyvyistaan sangyssa, paattaa vietella ujon collegeopiskelijan Hannah Steelen ja johdattaa hanet "romantiikan" maailmaan.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than hed ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. Its about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead!

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the towns growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie work to save a young man from a hangmans noose in New Mexico.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Miachael Hall, Mitchell Kowall, and Jean Inness. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode features the beloved character actor Jack Elam as Black Jack Ketchum.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie investigate a cattle dispute in Wyoming. When evidence starts to add up, it leads them to Matts old friend Tom Horn.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also sarring Louis Jean Heydt, Harry Woods, Michael Whalen, Stanley Andrews, and Walter Coy. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help the long-lost son of a Cree tribal chief.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go undercover as managers of a trading post. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: ITS A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin Singin Fightin Buckaroos Stop Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Mohawk
programme.desc: Kurt Neumann (The Fly, Rocketship X-M) directed this bawdy tale of a love that was louder than war drums! With a cast that includes Scott Brady, Rita Gam, and Neville Brand, the story takes place on a remote army post where an artist romances a trio of women, just as a vengeful settler turns the army and the local Iroquois tribe against each other. Film buffs might like to know that the cinematography for this feature is by four-time Oscar nominee Karl Struss, who won an Academy Award in 1929 for his work on Sunrise.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: John Wayne was 27 when he starred in this vintage western drama from Hollywoods Poverty Row. He plays Randy Bowers, a man wrongly jailed for murders. With help from a female friend, he breaks out of prison and sets out to find the real killers. Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons, Rustlers Paradise) directs a strong cast of familiar faces, including legendary sidekick George Gabby Hayes, Earl Dwyer, and one of the hardest ridin stuntmen turned actors, Yakima Canutt.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, its up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. Theres nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and its all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Pines
programme.desc: GENE AUTRY COMES ROARING OUT OF THE SKIES...to save the forests from an outlaw lumber ring! When ex forest ranger Gene tries to interfere with a gang destroying the timberland, hes framed for cattle-poisoning and set up for a murder charge. Yet, he still has time to sing some great cowboy songs, including Its My Lazy Day, and Hair of Gold. This is Gene Autry in a slightly different role, with some great footage filmed at Big Bear Valley and San Bernardino National Forest.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: Theres plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss stunning photography

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In Ghost Bushwackers, the G-Men are authorized by the Army to do undercover work in the lawless Arizona territory.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-Men seek out stolen gold.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kates Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after hes arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Jeff Taggerts brother is accused of robbing the Del Rio bank. While investigating the case, Jeff is implicated in the hold up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Sheriff Blade arrives from Comstock to arrest rancher Del Randall, but the Judge thinks the charges are trumped up. Bean and Taggart put Del in jail for safety while they investigate Blades connection to suspiciously wealthy Mendenhall. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A trader ignites a war between the Hurons and the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: After a long winter, the Tuscarora tribe struggles for survival. Hawkeye and Chingachcook set out to help.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: Roy Rogers debuts in his starring role as the likable cowboy sent to Congress with a mission: let Washington know about the suffering of farmers in the wake of Americas 1930s Dustbowl. Enjoy the singing cowboy in his first starring role, rubbing shoulder with politians, going up against greedy executives, and representing a whole people group youll see why Rogers became a national icon! Frog Millhouse: Smiley Burnett. Elanore Fairbanks: Carol Hughes. John Fairbanks: Guy Usher. Plus music and singing from the Maple City Four. (The song Dust was nominated for an Academy Award!) Directed by Joe Kane.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Dale Evans team up in this tale of silver mines, kidnappings, and secret passages. Roy plays a border guard who has to rescue Dale from the clutches of underhanded miner Rex Gridley (John McGuire). How does he do it? With help from Trigger, of course! With a cast that inclues Andy Devine as Sheriff Cookie Bullfincer, director William Witney gives us an enjoyable drama from the golden era of Republic Pictures!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywoods fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boones daughter. Theres plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isnt how you die, Boone says. Its what you live for.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a womans love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Between Men
programme.desc: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir Georges missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren / Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. It attracts around 45,000 visitors, who are able to gaze at more than 5000 automobile treasures. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin attend the event.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: With more than 500 supercars from Lamborghini, Ferrari or expensive brands like Bugatti and Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the worlds largest Supercars Rallye. Participants can look forward to action-packed stages.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Station wagons remain practical vehicles with a lot of space. The Skoda Octavia Scout and the Opel Insignia Country Tourer want to be more than that. A bigger ground clearance, hub caps, underride guard, and a body side.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: A look at some of the most extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck, a Ford Raptor, a Mercedes G-Class conversion, a modified Volkswagen Touareg, a Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Asian car design has evolved over the last years. At Lexus, the luxury vehicle division of Toyota, the current trend is toward angular shapes and aggressive appearance.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Same platform, but three different models: The Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people and scores with a favorable entry-level price. The Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive, but offers a broader range of engines and more technical gadgets.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: By selling and assembling accessories for Jeep, ORZ Vehicles makes the American off-road dream come true for European customers.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: SUVs are still popular and the segment grows steadily. Especially smaller SUVs enter the market. They are perfect for the city, off-road capabilities are less important.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Ralph R. Debbas had the dream to build ultimate supercar and first one developed in Arabic world.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The BMW M6 Gran Coupe is the latest SUV from Munich combining the best of luxury, power, design and comfort.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Wiesmann MF5 Roadster, the Audi R8 V10 Spyder and the Ruf RT 35 are real Bavarian fellows but faster than every Weisswurst and beer.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: They are sleek, exclusive, and most of all: they are extremely fast - supercars!

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Maybach Exelero: a car directly from Gotham City! Truly one of a kind with 700 horsepower and a 350 km/h max.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Forces Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time, the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol; these arent normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: BMW M3 and Mercedes C63 AMG. The top models battle it out forever. While the C63 has better performance values on paper, the M3 has always been delivering the better performance. Its a never ending back and forth.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Aston Martin Vanquish has a roaring V12 engine that outputs 576 hp and an ability to go: from 0 to 100 in 3.8 seconds. Its top speed: 323 km/h.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Lamborghini Huracan is brutal. Its V10 naturally aspirated engine produces 610 hp and catapults the Italian fighting bull from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.1 seconds. But some people think that thats not enough power.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Around the world, the Mercedes S-Class is considered to be one of the most elegant and luxurious limousines. Now the S-Class treads new paths and presents itself topless for the very first time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The bigger, the better. This subject is, however, disputed, especially when it comes to rear-wings. But anybody who sees a car with a big rear-wing knows: There is mighty power under the hood - and it needs to be harnessed.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: An up-close look at how the Mercedes SL evolved from a racing car into a luxury sports vehicle.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang is one of the most successful sports cars in the world and has been an icon for over 50 years. It has amazed the world with its power, speed and amazing design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: One of the biggest icons of the swinging sixties was the Mini. It was the perfect car of its time and often crowded streets of London.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Beetle is not just a car. For many people its THE car. Built over 22 million times, it has conquered every continent of the world. Being 60 years old, it tells us more about our century than many history books.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Ferrari - the name alone gets your heart racing. Wherever the iconic fire red legend from Maranello is, the car with the jumping horse on its emblem is always at the center of attention. Car History recounts the story of Ferrari.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew at BSG Racing is familiar with spectacular conversions. Dirk Hattenhauer and his boys have already refined a lot of cars and now they perform a special project, as they want to refurbish an old Opel Kadett C Coupe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A lot of work, attention to detail and passion is packed into a tuned show car. But it might take some time until a car like this is ready to stand on its own four wheels.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing compete at the European Tuning Showdown.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A show where one will find eccentric guys, the craziest car constructions and the funniest competitions.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Vintage cars as an investment.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the BMW 328 Schluter.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, and sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Offroad and Fun, Part 30
programme.desc: Enjoying a mix of rally, rallycross and acrobatics.

programme.title: Offroad and Fun, Part 30
programme.desc: Enjoying a mix of rally, rallycross and acrobatics.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Bentley and the Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars presents three cars with a combined output of 1779 HP: McLaren MP4-12, Mercedes SLS AMG GT, and Porsche 911 Turbo S. Theres hardly any car that can match their performance, elegance or workmanship.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars takes a look behind the scenes of the final race of the 2013 Blancpain Endurance Series.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of car advertising .

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of the car advertisement.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of the car advertisement.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 60-year history of the Chevrolet Corvette gives insight into what makes it a present-day global bestseller and symbol of the American driving experience.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: 50 years Porsche 911, and 60 years Chevrolet Corvette. Two legends, two dreamcars each with two opponents philosophies.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the worlds most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesnt fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. Thats why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The largest car exhibition in the world. More than 900 exhibitors present their latest models.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Testing what Corvettes, Porsches and Ferraris really have under the hood after SKN Tuning.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon visits Aston Martin. The manufacturer introduces The Aston Martin V12 Zagato at the Nurburgring.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Since 1967, Las Vegas has hosted one of the largest Car and Tuning shows in the world, the SEMA show. In the United States, car freedom is still important and at this show one can find extremes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuner from Waiblingen in Swabia, Germany, has over 30 years experience in tuning Mercedes Benz cars.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An event for automotive and motor sports enthusiasts where the most extreme vehicles can be seen.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Follows W Motors as they present their prototype of the Lykan HyperSport at the Dubai Motor Show, where the twin turbo flat six 770 hp engine comes alive as a fully assembled car for the first time.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: The hardest Enduro Rally in the world. If you make it here, you can count yourself amongst the toughest of them all.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: The feeling of Wild West on a Harley in still alive in Phoenix, Arizona.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: Stunt rider Rainer Schwarz tests the Harley-Davidson XR 1200.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: A look at whats involved when working as a highly acclaimed racing driver.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: Test riding models of the Italian brand.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: The Buell 1125R is the only model not powered by a Harley motor. The marquee sets off in a new direction.

programme.desc: Mr Bean bites off more than he can chew when he attempts DIY dentistry.

programme.title: Flat Pack
programme.desc: Mr. Beans bookcase collapses, so he buys a new one in the hardware store.

programme.title: Cash Machine

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: The Sofa

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: Wish You Were Dead
programme.desc: Hayley Udall tries to make ends meet for herself and her 14 year-old daughter while providing alimony for a horrible ex-husband. She wishes her problems with her ex could go away, and upon venting her frustrations one night, finds herself tangled up in a pact with two people (Melanie and Kevin) to “eliminate” each other’s problems.

programme.title: A Moving Romance
programme.desc: After inheriting her familys moving company, a young woman starts to clash with the manager who thought he was going to take over.

programme.title: Nash
programme.desc: This coming of age documentary chronicles the life of NBA All Star Steve Nash as he tries to navigate his way through the somewhat toils of professional sports while trying to leave a lasting legacy on and off the court.

programme.title: Love on the Vines
programme.desc: When Diana inherits half her uncle’s vineyard, she is surprised to find a rule requiring her to work the land with new co-owner Seth or risk losing the land.

programme.title: Killer Mom
programme.desc: When a girls father dies and leaves behind $40 million, her mom plans to seize it by any means necessary.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mothers death and her fathers mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Sisters of the Groom
programme.desc: Jason ropes his neighbor Sarah into pretending to be his girlfriend for his brother’s wedding but his prying sisters suspect something is amiss.

programme.title: Undoing Perfect
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jude, Theresa and their beautiful daughter Uju seem like the perfect family, but Theresa has a dark secret which she does everything to protect. Everything changes when Uju falls ill and slums and requires immediate blood transfusion. Jude gets the shock of his life as he realizes he is not Uju’s father. "Undoing perfect" is a contemporary story of love, trust, betrayal and hurt, a sincere story of love and marriage.

programme.title: For Richer
programme.desc: Leye and Hadiza Adeyemi have fallen out of love with each other and find themselves heading for a divorce. They are both very happy with this decision until Leye’s parents come to stay for the weekend and things gets very awkward.

programme.title: Hooked
programme.desc: Femi is a good man who tries to always do right by his family. When he finds himself fired from work and unable to provide for his pregnant wife, he turns to his friend, Jaiye, for help and advice. Jaiye presents a business proposal which Femi reluctantly agrees to, not knowing exactly what he is walking into.

programme.title: Stitched Love
programme.desc: Isabel has it all going well for her as a student, sister, and daughter until finding out the man she loves leaves her in a traumatic state.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After a wild night, Nonso wakes up to find his girlfriend Ronke, dead in the bathroom. He raises the alarm with his friends, John and Wole, along with their girlfirends, but everyone denies knowing what happened and all have alibis for when Ronke died. The only person without an alibi is Nonso who denies killing Ronke.

programme.title: A Second Chance at Love
programme.desc: 11 years after his heart is broken by Mercy, Bryan runs into her when he comes back to Lagos after being abroad for his studies. They begin to rekindle their relationship until a huge secret kept by mercy threatened to tear apart the very fabric of their love, but can love conquer all?

programme.title: Lurikos
programme.desc: Terminally-ill Michael believes he has found new love with Serena (Tamara Jones) after his wife is killed in a car accident. However, things are complicated when he finds out Serena is promised to another, but will true love find a way through all these challenges?

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A womans seemingly perfect life falls apart when she catches another woman in the arms of her fiance. Things get worse when she is kidnapped but all is not as it seems.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: Stood Up
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the day of her wedding to Patrick, Roselyn receives a message from him telling her that he would not be showing up as he can no longer marry her. Heartbroken, she reluctantly rekindles her relationship with Walter, her ex boyfriend, who she broke up with because of his cult ties. Walter convinces Roselyn he is no longer in a cult, and they soon make plans to marry, however the unexpected happens a night to their wedding.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Jennifer Mairo
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Natse Jemide
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Dionee
programme.desc: Paul, a young mechanic, falls in love with an orange-seller, Dionee, and decides to send her to the city and pay for her education. After some time Paul proposes to her but Dionee rejects him, deciding she can do better than an illiterate man.

programme.title: Coincidental Love
programme.desc: In the quest of getting a man to impress her nosy sister and brother in-law, Pearl gets entangled with Kennedy, who pretends to be Pearls blind date, Jerry, someone she has hired to help her out. When Pearl finds out this lie, she kicks Kennedy out of her house but they keep crossing paths.

programme.title: Fallen Out
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Pascal is a loving husband and father, but with his wife working in Canada, he feels like a single father to their twin teenage daughters, Rachel and Vivian. With no proper supervision the girls get up to no good behind their father’s back and when he tries to discipline them, they do the unthinkable in an effort to escape the boundaries set.

programme.title: The Wrong Date
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Amanda decides she does not want to go on a blind date with Dominic, she convinces her friend Kemi to go instead. Kemi and Dominic hit it off unexpectedly, but she becomes afraid to tell him the truth for fear of rejection. Things get more complicated when Amanda decides that Dominic is the man for her and tries to get him from Kemi.

programme.title: Just A Little Wait
programme.desc: A couple desperate to have a child begin to look for solutions to their problem outisde the home, which slowly begins the breakdown of their marriage.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: May gets a job as the house-help to a difficult man, Ramsey, and her working situation gets even worse when Ramseys girlfriend believes there is something more than a work relationship between them.

programme.title: Undoing Perfect
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jude, Theresa and their beautiful daughter Uju seem like the perfect family, but Theresa has a dark secret which she does everything to protect. Everything changes when Uju falls ill and slums and requires immediate blood transfusion. Jude gets the shock of his life as he realizes he is not Uju’s father. "Undoing perfect" is a contemporary story of love, trust, betrayal and hurt, a sincere story of love and marriage.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. In a bid to find love, plus sized Tobi decides to slide into the DM’s of her crush, Mofe, using the picture of her slimmer friend, Sharon. Things get complicated when Mofe wants to meet up with Tobi in person.

programme.title: In The Pursuit of Love
programme.desc: In his quest to find true love, a young CEO decides to disguise himself and hide his true identity. He meets a female who challenges his whole idea of love and hustle. Will this be his final bus stop?

programme.title: Six Feet Too Far
programme.desc: A model falls in love and marries her manager with the promise that they will have a child when her career takes off. Things start looking good for her but he is still hesitant to take the next step, and she goes on a mission to find out why.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Amaeya
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Wizard Chan
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Hurdles
programme.desc: An arrogant, fastidious and yet successful young lady eventually meets her match. To her dismay, he is unnerved by her attitude, flouts her rules and refuses to bend to her will, causing him to get under her skin.

programme.title: Enemy Within
programme.desc: When her son, Jerry, dies in a car accident, Mrs Briggs is quick to blame, Boma, her sons girlfriend who she disapproves of. She tries to get Osaze, her sons best friend and laywer to prosecute Boma, but time shows that the enemy is a little closer to home.

programme.title: Forever Is A Lie
programme.desc: Jason and Ivy are a young couple and partners in love and in crime as they get money from commiting fraudulent activities against unsuspecting victims, however things start to go wrong when jealousy seeps in and one of them takes things too far. Starring Jessica Tse, Chuddy Davidson, Dante Okere

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

Walter convinces Roselyn he is no longer in a cult, and they soon make plans to marry, however the unexpected happens a night to their wedding.

programme.title: 70s School Disco!

programme.desc: Youd think these 50 brilliant songs of the 70s from icons like The Police. Blondie, Elton John, Abba and more must have been huge - but they all missed the Top 10! Watch and weep.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees and Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: 20 Truckin Good Tunes!
programme.desc: Switch on your CB radio, grab a bar of that chunky chocolate, and climb abroad for ninety minutes of top tunes for all you 70s truckers out there. Can I get a big 10-4, buddy?!

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock and power ballads - all day!

programme.desc: The hairvolution of rocknroll - the good, the bad, and the ugly. Pat Sharp is back with a countdown of classic 70s songs accompanied by dodgy 70s hair-donts!

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock and power ballads - all day!

programme.title: Fleetwood Mac! 1975-1989
programme.desc: Ignore the grainy visuals - just sit back and enjoy Fleetwood Mac in their late 70s and 80s pomp! 11 classic songs, in order, through Rumours, Tusk and Tango In The Night.

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock and power ballads - all day!

programme.title: John, Paul, George and Ringo!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 John, Paul, George and Ringo!
programme.desc: Following their 60s world domination, The Beatles went their separate ways with varying degrees of musical success! Here are some solo videos by the Fab Four from the 1970s and 80s.

programme.title: Killer Queen! 1974-1979
programme.desc: Along with Abba, Elton John and Rod Stewart - Queen dominated the 70s and like them continue to resonate today! The songs are magnificent, and the videos are quite good too!

programme.title: Bams Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.desc: A 10 hour pentathlon of power - a deafening decade of hits! 130 songs to turn up loud, presented by the only man who can - Bam!

programme.title: The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decades biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So whos no.1?

programme.title: Ghostbusters! 1980-1989
programme.desc: A decade of blood curdling vampires, devilish demons, freaky phantoms and ghoulish ghosts in the music and videos of the 80s!

programme.title: Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.desc: Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s biggest songs from the movies. But dont forget to switch off those mobile phones!

programme.title: NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.desc: Simon Bates with the ultimate countdown of 80s love. Yes - 100 songs with heartfelt vocals, lush strings and big breakdowns in a 9 hour marathon! Expect Whitney, Lionel and George.

programme.title: Endless Love! All Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endless Love! All Day
programme.desc: All day long - classic 80s love songs from the NOW Thats What I Call Music archive. Timeless anthems of passion and heartbreak.

programme.title: Love At The Movies! with Pat Sharp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love At The Movies! with Pat Sharp
programme.desc: Grab the biggest tub of popcorn, snuggle up to your loved one and expect plenty of smooching in the back row as Pat Sharp has a session of 80s movie magic, all on the theme of lurve!

programme.title: Its All For Charity Baby!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Its All For Charity Baby!
programme.desc: 11 smashes which raised millions for good causes in the 1980s. From USA for Africa and Children In Need to Comic Relief - It was all for charity baby!

programme.title: Where Did THAT No.1 Come From?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Where Did THAT No.1 Come From?!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of novelty hits and terrifying chart toppers - all of them came out of nowhere, and all of them topped got to UK number 1!

programme.title: Ladies In Red! Top 10
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ladies In Red! Top 10
programme.desc: Seems like red was the colour to be seen in during the 80s. Here are 10 of our favourite videos - and youll not be surprised to know we start with Chris De Burgh!

programme.title: Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
programme.desc: All day, at the start of every hour - a new random collection of 80s music! Itll make sense.

programme.title: Top Gun 1986 v Maverick 2022
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Gun 1986 v Maverick 2022
programme.desc: Soundtrack songs from the original of 1986 and the sequel from 2022. Including The Who, OneRepublic, Lady Gaga, Kenny Loggins, Harold Faltermeyer and Berlin.

programme.title: 1985s One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1985 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Maria Vidal, Arcadia, John Parr and Phyllis Nelson?

programme.title: Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
programme.desc: All day, at the start of every hour - a new random collection of 80s music! Itll make sense.

programme.title: Showtunes! 1982-1989
programme.desc: 60 minutes of classics from a golden age of musical theatre - the 1980s. Featuring Cats, Phantom, Chess, Dreamgirls and Aspects of Love, plus lesser known musicals Mutiny and Time.

programme.title: Hey You! Get Into My Car! Top 10
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hey You! Get Into My Car! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 fabulous 80s videos featuring lots of motors. And some of them have lovely ladies sprawled over lovely cars. Enjoy!

programme.title: Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Random 80s Day! Fresh Every Hour
