programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistans Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Iceland Traverse - Mountain Bike Expedition - Iceland
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to go through Iceland by mountain bike. Unlike touring bikers, they want to explore the best single trails. They developed a plan to conquer the deep rivers, snow fields and sandy sections along the way.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #32: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023
programme.desc: Der Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023 (AUT) ist der anspruchsvollste Radmarathon der Alpen und besticht durch seinen Mix aus Tal- und Hochgebirgslandschaften, die zu einer einzigartigen Atmosphare beitragen.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #33: Mystic Skate Cup 2023
programme.desc: In dieser Episode ist es soweit: Der Mystic Skate Cup 2023 in Prag, Tschechische Republik, steht vor der Tur. Einige der besten Skateboarder der Welt werden ihr Konnen zeigen und das Event zu einem Spektakel machen. Werfen wir einen Blick darauf!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #34: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU)
programme.desc: Bei der diesjahrigen Jubilaumsausgabe gehen Teilnehmer aus uber 55 Nationen an den Start, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2023 #35: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 - The Stars of Big Air

programme.desc: Der 15. jahrliche Ski-Film von Level 1. Mit dabei: Magnus Graner. LSM. Will Berman. Duncan Adams. Sig Tveit. Adam Delorme. Tim McChesney. Wiley Miller. Khai Krepela. Will Wesson. Sandy Boville. Shay Lee. Tanner Rainville. LJ Strenio. Banks Gilberti. Logan Imlach.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #17: Motosurf World Games - Fujairah (UAE)
programme.desc: This year, MotoSurf came to Fujairah with an event of a special kind - the 2025 World Games Qualifier. The best MotoSurf athletes from around the world competed to select the 24 best male and female athletes in the sport.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #18: Swatch Nines – The Perfect Hip
programme.desc: When the morning mist clears over the Swiss Alps, the arena of snow and ice awakens. Directly below the Schilthorn, between the mountain ridges of Interlaken, huge masses of snow have been pressed into a beautiful, highly aesthetic Trannyland

programme.title: WOF 2025 #19: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #20: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: Sunny
programme.desc: Level 1 injected a positive mood into the ski season – giving a dose of light therapy to dark northern landscapes of Scandinavia, Alaska, Japan and British Columbia. So sit back and relax, put your shades on and soak up the rays- the future looks bright.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #24: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Portimao, Portugal, welcomed the worlds best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Highlights
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Highlights

programme.title: inter Games 2019 - Freeride Wanaka (NZL)
programme.desc: The Winter Games New Zealand is an annual international elite winter sports event that attracts the worlds best athletes. This is the seventh edition of the Games, taking place in Queenstown, Wanaka and Naseby in August and September 2019.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features an SUV that goes on a rampage, a minimarket stickup and a brazen bank robber.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in Florida, a car theft sting and a postman who hires a hitman.

programme.title: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimensions elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declans web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: Kings vs Dragons
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there’s more to lose than just his allowance! Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City’s most feared motorcycle momma?

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

programme.title: City Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuyas dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Synchro Sector
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms… and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Scream for the Green
programme.desc: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they’re introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

programme.title: Duelings Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Showdown in the Slammer
programme.desc: Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!

programme.title: Heros Fall
programme.desc: With his deck on the line, Yuya looks to rock the cell block and KO the Kingpin!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Yuya is determined to do the impossible and escape from The Facility, but when friends become foes his plan to break out, breaks down!

programme.title: Fight for Freedom
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals try to flee The Facility, their big breakout takes a terrible turn when their escape route leads them straight into the security guards!

programme.title: Match with the Master
programme.desc: The opening ceremonies of the Friendship Cup kick into overdrive as Yuya squares off against the Master of Faster - Jack Atlas!

programme.title: Traits of a Traitor
programme.desc: With the Friendship Cup about to kick off, Yuya learns about tournament champion Jack’s rise to the Tops!

programme.title: Crows Crew
programme.desc: The first duel of the Friendship Cup has the green light as Crow and Gong put the pedal to the metal!

programme.title: Rileys Reveal
programme.desc: Riley’s been chosen to Turbo Duel Shinji, but the battle hits a speedbump when Yuya steps in to stop the duel and keep his pint-sized pal in one piece!

programme.title: Common Cause
programme.desc: For Shinji to inspire the Commons to stand up to the Topsiders, he must first take down Moon Shadow! Can Shinji’s monsters swarm together and deliver the sting of defeat, or will Moon Shadow’s ninjas silence all the buzz?

programme.title: A Concerted Effort
programme.desc: Yuya’s friends are forced to face off in a duel where the loser is banished forever! No matter who wins, Yuya loses!

programme.title: The Gift of Grit
programme.desc: As the Friendship Cup picks up the pace, Jack Atlas takes a timeout to reveal the secrets of his past!

programme.title: Duel Consequences
programme.desc: Officer 227 is in hot pursuit to take Yuya down - all the way down to the underground! Can Yuya outrun the long arm of the law, or does 227 have his number?

programme.title: Turbotrainers
programme.desc: Sylvio finally takes center stage at the Friendship Cup, but will he crash and burn under the spotlight?

programme.title: Turning Point
programme.desc: An escapee from the underground brings word to Yuya on how to take control of the Friendship Cup!

programme.title: A Traitor Unmasked
programme.desc: Shay’s duel with Dennis turns into a battle of wits when he tries to force Dennis to reveal his dark secret

programme.title: Shays Revenge
programme.desc: After finding out that Dennis is from the Fusion Dimension, Shay sets his sights on getting revenge!

programme.title: Plans of Attack
programme.desc: Yuya and Roget reflect on their pasts to make plans for the future!

programme.title: A Cons Game
programme.desc: Zuzu goes deck-to-deck against Sergey – an ex-con who’s looking to “X” out the competition!

programme.title: Rebel Road
programme.desc: Zuzu’s been hurt, but Yuya can’t race to her rescue until he defeats Shinji first!

programme.title: Road to Rebellion
programme.desc: Shinji’s Battlewasps are stinging Yuya to submission! But does Yuya have one last card that will tip the scales in his favor?

programme.title: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Yuya’s newest ally is… Roget? Questions are raised that plunge Yuyas reputation into a freefall!

programme.title: Battle Birds
programme.desc: Crow and Shay soar down the track in a high-flying battle where the loser will crash land into the underground!

programme.title: Warriors of the Air
programme.desc: Shay and Crows winged warriors fight, claw and flap towards the finale…until an unexpected guest decides to join their duel!

programme.title: A Matter of Trust
programme.desc: Zuzu’s on the run from Sector Security, but can a little help from some little friends help her avoid big trouble?

programme.title: A Plan and a Promise - Part 1
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup heats up as Yugo and Celina tear through the tricky twists and turns of a transforming duel track!

programme.title: Truth and Consequences, Part 2
programme.desc: Sayer continues to manipulate Akiza in her Duel against Misty. Now, only Yusei can stop him by forcing him to reveal the truth about what really happened to Mistys brother the day of his death.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 1
programme.desc: The King of the Netherworld arises from B.A.D. and approaches New Domino City. Rex Goodwin, who tries to use the powers of both a Signer and a Dark Signer to become a God, engages in a Turbo Duel with Yusei, Jack and Crow.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Yusei, Jack, Crow, and Rex Goodwin continues. Rex Summons "Earthbound Immortal Wiraqocha Rasca" and uses its effect to reduce Crows Life Points to 1. Due to massive injuries, Crow is unable to continue the Duel after falling off his Duel Runner.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 3
programme.desc: Due to the effect of "Wiraqocha Rasca", Jack is blasted from the Duel. Now, only Yusei can save the world from Goodwin and stop the King of the Netherworld from reaching New Domino City.

programme.title: Go With the Flow - Part 1
programme.desc: In Heartland, Yuma Tsukumo aspires to be the worlds best Duelist. Despite this, he is not a good Duelist. When he ends up Dueling, Shark, a student known to have pro-level skills, odd things begin to happen and Yumas story begins.

programme.title: Go With the Flow - Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Yuma and Ryoga comes to its conclusion. In order to take down "Leviathan Dragon", Yuma obtains a "Number" monster of his own, "Utopia".

programme.title: In the End - Part 1
programme.desc: Astrals been unable to leave since Yuma Dueled Shark, so, despite his reluctance, hes begun living with Yuma. At an inconvenient time, Akari Tsukumo has trouble when her PC she uses as a stay-at-home reporter crashes. When her big scoop is deleted as a result of a system down the city suffered, she orders Yuma to find an alternate scoop she can use for another manuscript. When Yuma goes into town, the traffic lights go nuts, causing downtown to fall into chaos. Yuma looks for the criminal who spread the computer virus that caused all this chaos.

programme.title: In the End - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma challenges Professor Kitano, who is behind it all. Professor Kitano notes that each time he reduces his opponents Life Points with "Electronic Computer-Beast Tera Byte" Astrals body weakens, causing him to slowly vanish! To make things worse, the Explosive Virus Time Bomb Ukyo has set is slowly reaching its countdown.

programme.title: Flipping Out - Part 1
programme.desc: A strange shadow approaches Yuma, which turns out to be Tokunosuke Omoteura, a classmate of Yumas known for his duplicitous tongue. In the morning, Yuma was reprimanded for a prank he pulled in front of the whole class that he has no memory of causing. As a result, hes been cut off from every one else. Tokunosuke gently says "Lets Duel". With "Baby Tragon" his new Xyz Monster, Yuma might enjoy this duel, but Tokunosuke seems to be planning something.

programme.title: Flipping Out - Part 2
programme.desc: Tokunosuke steals Yumas "Utopia", causing Astral to vanish. Tokunosuke wanted the great power of Numbers, and Yuma tries to Summon "Leviathan Dragon" to fight back, but Tokunosukes Trap Card takes even that away. When Yuma is pushed into a corner with his field, an unexpected monster will become the Trump Card of the Duel.

programme.title: The Sparrow - Part 1
programme.desc: After having been around a while and having to work with Yuma, Astrals been fascinated by a TV Show Hero named "Different Dimension ESPer Robin". For some reason, Astral feels close and similar to this Robin from an alternate universe. One day, pictures show up with Robin in a fight downtown! Yuma, prodded by Astral, goes with Kotori to where the autographs were taken and meets Robins actor, a kid named Fuya! But Fuya is a timid boy who doesnt resemble the Robin they all admire in the slightest.

programme.title: The Sparrow - Part 2
programme.desc: The mysterious person posing as Robin around town was Fuya. Under the intolerable strain of being a hero, Fuyas heart has been overcome by darkness Yuma challenges him to a Duel to save his soul. Robin, however, possesses "Number 83: Galaxy Queen". With it, he proceeds to summon one character after another from the TV Show. At first, Yuma and Astral were amused by this, but due to Galaxy Queens almighty Monster Effect, they quickly grow impatient. To make things worse, Galaxy Queen, who currently possesses Robin, has taken on the appearance of Fuyas mother.

programme.title: A Plan and a Promise - Part 2
programme.desc: Yugo’s in for a bumpy ride as he’s forced to zigzag his way across a duel track that’s been mapped for mayhem by Roget!

programme.title: Against All Odds
programme.desc: Furious over Celinas failure at the Friendship Cup, Roget sends a squad of Sector Security to seize her.

programme.title: The Many Dimensions of Yuya
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Crow takes a turn for the worse when Roget takes control of Yuya’s mind!

programme.title: Wake Up Call
programme.desc: Crow gets a crash course on double crossing when Yuya pulls a U-turn on their friendship!

programme.title: Hunted and Hounded
programme.desc: Obelisk Force has invaded New Domino City to capture Zuzu and Celina! Can Yuya and his friends stop this unstoppable force?

programme.title: Down With the Underground
programme.desc: Barrett has returned to snatch Celina back to Duel Academy – unless the Lancers can stop him!

programme.title: Chain Game
programme.desc: Barrett has chained up Yuya and his monsters! Can Yuya break his shackles before Barrett breaks away with Celina?

programme.title: Tragic Reunion
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Barrett comes to a shocking conclusion when a mind-controlled madman drops into their duel!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Jack’s most dangerous duel ever as he takes on Roget’s maniacal minion - Sergey!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 2
programme.desc: Can Jack Atlas best Sergey, when Sergey combines the best of man and machine?

programme.title: Martial Flaw
programme.desc: Roget declares himself leader of New Domino City! Can the Lancers overthrow this madman, or will Roget’s Sector Security end any chances they have?

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup finale is finally here! Jack and Yuya square off to see who will become New Domino City’s newest champion!

programme.title: Making it Mine
programme.desc: Jack pushes Yuya to his limits in the Friendship Cup finale! Does Yuya have the dueltaining skills to dethrone the Master of Faster, or will Jack’s rule reign supreme?

programme.title: Making it Mine
programme.desc: Jack pushes Yuya to his limits in the Friendship Cup finale! Does Yuya have the dueltaining skills to dethrone the Master of Faster, or will Jack’s rule reign supreme?

programme.title: Friendship Finale
programme.desc: With the City on the edge of their seats, a new champion is about to be crowned! But who will sit in the winner’s circle: Yuya or Jack?

programme.title: A Vicious Cycle
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup may be over, but trouble sure isn’t! Roget is planning to take Zuzu to Duel Academy!

programme.title: A Warlike Welcome
programme.desc: Yuya reaches a new place - Heartland City, the hometown of Yuto and Shay in the Xyz Dimension along with Sylvio and Gong. There they meet Duel Academy soldiers and an independent warrior from that dimension.

programme.title: Realm of The Cipher Dragon
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Sawatari fight against the mysterious Kaito, who believes them to be agents of Academia. As he summons his fearsome Galaxy Eyes Cipher Dragon, Yuto notes that something has changed in Kaito.

programme.title: Rush For Revenge
programme.desc: Kaito begins a merciless assault against Yuya with his powerful Galaxy Eyes deck. With Yutos spirit on his side, Yuya tries to match Kaitos indomitable spirit with both Odd Eyes Pendulum Dragon and Dark Rebellion Xyz Dragon.

programme.title: Rise of the Resistance
programme.desc: Yuya and the others meet the Xyz Resistance, who discuss how Heartland fell to ruin and Yushos mysterious connection to them. Elsewhere, in the Fusion Dimension, Yuzu flees Academia soldiers when someone unexpected comes to her rescue.

programme.title: Rumble in the Rubble
programme.desc: Yusho explains what happened during his disappearance to Yuzu while in the Fusion Dimension. Back in Heartland, Yuya comes across an angry youth with a grudge against his Dueltaining style as Yuto refuses to stand by any longer.

programme.title: Fighting For Friendship
programme.desc: Shun is determined to convince Kaito to rejoin the Resistance despite Kaitos adamant refusal. As the former friends cannot convince each other either way, they decide all they can do is fight against each other.

programme.title: An Academic Test
programme.desc: Yusho reveals that three years ago he learned of the Arc Area Project and Academias machinations, going on a journey to stop Leos plans. Yuri arrives at the You Show Duel School to stamp out the resistance against Academia.

programme.title: Belles and Whistles
programme.desc: Allen and Sayaka try to fight Kaito only to end up facing Grace and Gloria Tyler, two of Academias strongest enforcers. Having no choice but to fight, they face off against the Tylers Amazoness deck.

programme.title: Twins with ‘Tude
programme.desc: As Sawatari and Gongenzaka both fail to defeat the Tyler sisters, Yuya and Shun arrive to meet their challenge. In the face of their near perfect combo, Yuya must not give into his rage and defeat his powerful foes.

programme.title: Surprise Showing
programme.desc: Yuya and the others try to return to the Resistance base when they are attacked by the Obelisk Force. They try to face the power of the Obelisk Force when Shun becomes gravely injured during the battles.

programme.title: Fenced In
programme.desc: Academias enforcer Edo Phoenix challenges Yuya to a rematch. Torn between his allegiance to the Professor and his spirit of Dueltaining, a confused Edo is determined to crush Yuya and the ghost of Yusho that haunts him.

programme.title: Last Laugh
programme.desc: As their duel goes on, Edo only becomes more conflicted of where his allegiances lie. Seeing Edo suffer, Yuya is determined to remind him how fun dueling can be and begins his greatest Dueltaining performance yet.

programme.title: Hat Trick
programme.desc: Convincing Edo, the Tyler twins, and the rest of the forces in Heartland to join their side, Yuya and the other Lancers prepare to head to the Fusion Dimension to find their friends and restore everyone who has been turned into a card.

programme.title: Joy of Revenge
programme.desc: Yuya encounters his old foe from the Junior Youth Championship, Kachidoki. Kachidoki continues to use violent tactics and powerful Fusions in his Action Duels as Yuya tries to return a smile to his heart.

programme.title: All Duel Hands on Deck
programme.desc: Yuya and co board a ship to Duel Academy when Dennis catches up to them, aiming to defeat Yusho once and for all. A still vengeful Kaito meets Denniss challenge as the two unleash their greatest monsters.

programme.title: Shiver Me Lancers
programme.desc: Serena, who appeared before the Lancers, suddenly betrays them and captures Yuzu while Yuya is forced to fight Captain Solo. Caught between useless cards and Solos lock deck, things seem hopeless when more allies suddenly arrive.

programme.title: A Towering Achievement
programme.desc: Yugo meets with up the others and agree to work together against Academia. Yugo and Kaito head to the towers where Rin and Ruri are being held captive, only to face the guardians Apollo and Diana.

programme.title: Grip of the Parasite
programme.desc: The Doctor has brainwashed Ruri and Rin, leading them to fight against Yugo and Kaito. Meanwhile, Reiji recounts how all of Yuyas counterparts as well as all the bracelet girls are part of Leos ultimate plan: Revival Zero.

programme.title: Survival Of The Fittest
programme.desc: Yuya and the Lancers finally make it the Academy, but they are captured and thrown into a wild battle royale against the Obelisk Force. However, a mysterious enemy in the royale begins wiping out friend and foe alike.

programme.title: Family Face Off
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allies deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: The Battle Beast
programme.desc: The wild duelist known as Battle Beast crushes his fellow Academy students and even turns Crow and Tsukikage into cards. Yuya and Gongenzaka arrive to face the challenge of their insane foe.

programme.title: Taming of The BB
programme.desc: Jack appears out of nowhere and joins Yuya in fighting against Battle Beast. Battle Beasts instructor, Sanders, joins in the duel as well to show the power and glory of the Academy to the Lancers.

programme.title: Show of Nature
programme.desc: Battle Beast continues his rampage against friend and foe alike. Sensing nothing but rage and anger in Battle Beasts heart, Yuya is determined to show him how fun dueling can actually be and aims to purge his demons.

programme.title: 123 Fusion Destruction
programme.desc: Asuka stays behind to fight Yuri while Sora and the others go on ahead. Yuri uses a different deck and fights Asuka, who tries to reach out a helping hand to Yuri. Thats when Yuri reveals the real reason why he does what he does.

programme.title: Parasite Seeing
programme.desc: Yuya comes across Ruri, who is still under the control of the Doctors parasites. Yuya attempts to fight off Ruri, made harder when Serena joins the fight. Yuto decides to take control and face the two girls.

programme.title: Feline Frenzy
programme.desc: A suspicious shadow is trailing Yuma. It seems someone has been after Yuma, and their identity is the unassuming girl Cat-chan from Yumas class. Yuma and Kotori fall into Cat-chans trap. To rescue Kotori, hes going to have to Duel. Astral is cautious of the strange vibes hes getting from Cat-chan, especially with the strategy of her "Transforming Cat Deck"!

programme.title: Shark Attack
programme.desc: Yuma is reminded that his victories in his current Duels are due to Astrals help. To prove his skills, he fights Shark once more. Though Shark doesnt care to Duel again, he finally agrees when he finally reaches the end of his rope due to Yumas constant following him around. The Duel of these two begins. Can Yuma win against Shark, who has no "Number" cards, when he himself declares he wont use his "Number" cards or take the aid of Astral!?After his Duel with Shark, Yuma Duels Tetsuo Takeda without "Numbers" and loses twenty times in a row, with Tetsuo angry because Yuma lied about not using the "Numbers" against Shark. Yuma is scolded by Astral on his immaturity. On the other hand,...

programme.title: The Pack - Part 1
programme.desc: After his Duel with Shark, Yuma Duels Tetsuo Takeda without "Numbers" and loses twenty times in a row, with Tetsuo angry because Yuma lied about not using the "Numbers" against Shark. Yuma is scolded by Astral on his immaturity. On the other hand, Shark returns to "his place" where he gets involved with a criminal network. Yuma, who knew what was going on with Shark, challenges the two strongest thugs: Rikuo and Kaio, to what Shark proposes to be a 2 on 2 "Tag-Team Duel".

programme.title: The Pack - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma finds himself pinned down by the overwhelming power of "Number 61: Volcasaurus". To protect their precious remaining Life Points, he defends Shark at his own expense. When their opponents summon their second Number monster at that point, Astral becomes aware of the hidden mysteries underlying the Duel. In a last-ditch effort, Shark notices Yumas passion and entrusts him with 1 card that could turn the whole Duel around!

programme.title: The Number Hunter - Part 1
programme.desc: After a series of incidents, Yuma and Astral learn of the existence of a "Number Hunter". Astral remains wary of an unseen presence, but Yuma pretends not to care. As a result, a series of strange phenomena appear around these two. Undeniably, these are the signs of the coming of the "Number Hunter" named Kaito Tenjo. At that moment, a dangerous Duel with the Numbers cards on the line begins. With Kaitos power far beyond their reckoning, what can Astral or Yuma possibly do?

programme.title: The Number Hunter - Part 2
programme.desc: In just 1 Turn, Kaito Summons 2 Numbers. Yuma attempts to resist the onslaught, but all of his monsters have been removed from the field...! Kaito, capable of even more, summons the strongest Monster to exist: "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon", which has never been seen before! Yuma summons "Number 39: Utopia" to create a turnaround despite the impossible odds facing him.

programme.title: Training Days - Part 1
programme.desc: Having clearly seen Kaitos power, and how utterly hopeless they are, Yuma and Astral are keenly aware that they cannot easily recover. At that time, Yuma talks to his grandmother. She mentions a mysterious old man named Jurou at a "Duel Lodge" who owns a wooden statue of the Legendary Monster "Dark Magician", who is waiting for Yuma and his crew. Yuma makes a strong wish based on his desire to train and get better!

programme.title: Training Days - Part 2
programme.desc: Its a Duel against Jurous former disciple, Yamikawa! Yamikawa draws his Ninja monsters, pinning Yuma down, but believing in the power of his friends, Yuma must continue this battle to the Death! But, Yamikawa summons his Trump Card, the Number Monster "Armed Ninja - Crimson Shadow"! However, Yuma continues to believe in the power of his friends, but can this possibly lead him to win the Duel!?

programme.title: Its in the Cards - Part 1
programme.desc: Kotori and her friends, who are interested in the Number cards, plus Astral, form the "Number Club". To get more info about the Numbers, they visit the home of a fortuneteller, but the fortuneteller is under the orders of Kaito to collect the Number Cards! When the fortuneteller, Jin, kidnaps Kotori and the rest, Yuma and Astral come to the rescue, but the memory of their Duel with Kaito comes back, the visions of which continue to haunt them!

programme.title: Its in the Cards - Part 2
programme.desc: To save Kotori and the rest, Yuma continues to fight with Jin over the Numbers. Yumas Life Points continue to fall, putting the fate of Kotori and the rest in a perilous situation, as Jin worsens things by summoning a second Numbers. In the midst of such a terrible pinch, Astral finds himself scared by Kaitos looming shadow, but when he sees Yuma who refuses to give up, he steps back up to the fight. With the feelings of these two guys, "Utopia" obtains a new power!

programme.title: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: Yuma misplaces the the Emperors Key that was an important momento from his parents. He and Astral look high and low for it, but they just cant seem to find it. While they look, Astral is curious as to how the Emperors Key is related to Yumas father. Yuma starts talking about various memories from his childhood that he remembers about his dad. Yumas Never-Give-Up Spirit "Kattobingu" was born from a promise he made with his father.

programme.title: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: Yuma safely recovers "Number 96: Black Mist" from a man. Tetsuo, who witnessed the Duel, takes note that Yuma seems suddenly more brutal in his strategy, and ends up in a fight with him. Not having reconciled in over 2 days, suddenly Number 96 swallows Yuma and Astral up!! To rescue Yuma and Astral from Number 96, Tetsuo fights the Numbers for the first time!

programme.title: Rise Of The Parasites
programme.desc: Yuya and Yuto are struggling in their battle against Ruri and Serena and their Parasite Queen. The Doctor attempts to take control of Yuya using a parasite as well, but that only awakens the rage inside of Yuya once again.

programme.title: An Evil Ascends
programme.desc: Leo Akaba reveals to Yusho Sakaki how the four dimensions came to be.

programme.title: Revival Zero
programme.desc: Leo continues his story about how Zarc destroyed the original world. Leos daughter Ray used four cards to stop Zarc and split the world into the four current worlds. He then reveals the true nature of Yuya, Yuzu, and the Arc Area Project.

programme.title: What Lurks Beneath
programme.desc: Leo begins his final plan to fuse the dimensions and revive his daughter Ray. Reiji and Yuya team up to take down Leo, with Yuya resolving not to let Zarc be revived. Yusho realizes that even this is part of a larger enemys plan.

programme.title: A Duel Within
programme.desc: Leos plan gets further and further to completion, which causes the evil inside of Yuya to emerge once more. Yusho stops the duel and realizes that Zarcs influence is hovering over everything, including Yuyas other counterparts.

programme.title: Duel Interrupted
programme.desc: Yugo and Yuri being their duel, with Zarcs shared influence forcing them into battle. To stop Zarcs revival, Kaito and Edo join the battle as well to hold back Yuris powerful Fusion Dragon.

programme.title: Sibling Standoff
programme.desc: While Yuri and Yugo continue their savage battle, Reira starts hearing the voice of Ray. Aiming to make sure Ray is revived, Reira stands against Reiji and the siblings begin a duel with each other.

programme.title: Sleight of Hands
programme.desc: Reiji manages to defeat Reira, continuing on to fight Leo. Elsewhere, Yuri absorbs Yugo and aims to defeat Yuya so that Zarc can be completed. Yusho stands in for his son to fight the depraved youth instead.

programme.title: A Fathers Finale
programme.desc: Yushos advanced Dueltaining manages to push Yuri into a corner and bring Yuya back to his old self. But Yuri is determined to complete Zarcs revival and has one nasty surprise in store for Yusho.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuyas rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuris challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuris dragons, but Zarcs ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E292 Undercover Love S1 E292
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E87 Jodha Akbar S3 E87
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
